# r-avatar-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                 | Attribute                  | Description                                      | Type                                                                                                                                                                 | Default     |
| ------------------------ | -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `collapseAvatars`        | `collapse-avatars`         | Whether to collapse avatars                      | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                            | `false`     |
| `collapseAvatarsTooltip` | `collapse-avatars-tooltip` | Show tooltip with all collapsed avatars on hover | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                            | `false`     |
| `collapseClass`          | `collapse-class`           | Custom class for collapse avatar                 | `string`                                                                                                                                                             | `''`        |
| `effect`                 | `effect`                   | Tooltip theme                                    | `"dark" \| "light"`                                                                                                                                                  | `'light'`   |
| `maxCollapseAvatars`     | `max-collapse-avatars`     | Max avatars to show before collapsing            | `number`                                                                                                                                                             | `3`         |
| `placement`              | `placement`                | Tooltip placement                                | `"bottom" \| "bottom-end" \| "bottom-start" \| "left" \| "left-end" \| "left-start" \| "right" \| "right-end" \| "right-start" \| "top" \| "top-end" \| "top-start"` | `'top'`     |
| `popperClass`            | `popper-class`             | Custom class for tooltip                         | `string`                                                                                                                                                             | `''`        |
| `shape`                  | `shape`                    | Control the shape of avatars in this group       | `"circle" \| "square"`                                                                                                                                               | `'circle'`  |
| `size`                   | `size`                     | Control the size of avatars in this group        | `"default" \| "large" \| "small" \| number`                                                                                                                          | `'default'` |
